full_sentence: I don't think they are as attracted to ol' Hook Nose than they are to his MONEY. He also talks a good game, knowing what to say and when to say it. Case in point: I had to listen to an Jewish coworker waffle on and on about his wealth and how "cultured" he was. Decked out in high end clothes, metro-sexual hair doo, and frequently reminding us lowly Goyim that he has an advanced degree. He was clearly trolling for female coworkers. Some were actually falling for it. Luckily most of us could see straight through the charade, and we were able to talk these ladies out of associating with this guy.
